characters.name: Kurosaki Ichigo
characters.description: Ichigo is a Substitute Shinigami who initially borrowed Rukia's own Shinigami powers. Since then, Ichigo has unlocked and learned how to use Zangetsu while developing a close bond with him.

skills.name: Zangetsu Slash
skills.description: Ichigo charges at the enemy with his sword, dealing 20 physical damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 5 more physical damage every time it is used.

skills.name: Hollow Slayer
skills.description: Ichigo gathers all his energy and unleashes it in a giant sword wave. This deals 35 energy damage to one enemy and generates 1 random energy. This skill will deal 5 more energy damage every time it is used.

skills.name: Summon Zangetsu
skills.description: Ichigo summons the power of his sword to aid him. For 3 turns, his attacks will pierce armor and will deal 10 more damage. He will also gain 25 shield points that stack. This skill cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Zangetsu's Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Ichigo invulnerable for 1 turn.

characters.name: Kuchiki Rukia
characters.description: A Shinigami from the 13th division and the sister of Kuchiki Byakuya. She is skilled in various types of Kido for disabling enemies and is currently on a mission to the real world.

skills.name: Bakudo #1: Sai
skills.description: Rukia binds an enemy's arms and legs in place, dealing 10 energy damage and stunning them for 1 turn. If this skill is used after 'Hado #33: Sokatsui', it will also remove 1 random energy from the enemy.

skills.name: Hado #33: Sokatsui
skills.description: Rukia uses a lesser version of Sokatsui, dealing 20 energy damage to one enemy and reducing the physical damage they deal by 15 for 1 turn. If this skill is used after 'Bakudo #1: Sai', it will deal 10 more energy damage.

skills.name: Gokon Tekko
skills.description: For 2 turns, if an enemy is the target of new non-true damage, they will lose one random energy; this effect can only drain 1 per turn; damage skills that drain or remove energy will not activate this effect. The following 2 turns, this character's other skills will have their secondary effects automatically activated.

skills.name: Air Leap
skills.description: This skill makes Rukia invulnerable for 1 turn.

characters.name: Inoue Orihime
characters.description: A classmate and companion of Ichigo. While shy and timid, Orihime possesses powers that are beyond the understanding of Shinigami or Hollows; those of which allow her to negate or reject opposing powers that might harm her friends.

skills.name: Shun Shun Rikka: Tsubaki
skills.description: Orihime summons Tsubaki, who deals 10 armor piercing physical damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, that enemy will receive 5 more damage from physical and energy skills.

skills.name: Santen Kesshun
skills.description: Orihime places a shield to block incoming attacks. For 1 turn, Orihime and one ally will gain 20 points of shield and will heal 10 health.

skills.name: S≈çten Kisshun
skills.description: Orihime removes all debuffs on one ally for 2 turns and then heals that ally, or herself, for 25 health for 2 turns. If she is stunned on the second turn of its usage, that ally will instantly heal 15 health.

skills.name: Orihime's Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Orihime invulnerable for 1 turn.
